kinesiologia.title: Musculoskeletal Kinesiology
kinesiologia.subtitle: Rehabilitation & Movement
kinesiologia.description:
Our Musculoskeletal Kinesiology approach is designed to treat and rehabilitate dysfunctions of the locomotor system. Whether you suffer from chronic back pain, are recovering from knee surgery, or have a sports injury, our goal is to restore your full functionality.

We use an evidence-based approach combining advanced manual therapy, dry needling, and therapeutic exercise specifically dosed for your needs. We don't just focus on the symptom, but on the underlying biomechanical cause to ensure lasting results.

1.title: Comprehensive Evaluation
1.desc: Complete analysis of biomechanics, mobility, and strength to identify the root cause of the problem.

2.title: Manual Therapy
2.desc: Specialized tissue manipulation and mobilization techniques to restore function.

3.title: Therapeutic Exercise
3.desc: Personalized exercise plans to strengthen, stabilize, and re-educate movement.

4.title: Patient Education
4.desc: We teach you about your condition and how to manage it to empower you in your recovery.

acupuntura.title: Clinical Acupuncture
acupuntura.subtitle: Traditional Chinese Medicine
acupuntura.description:
Acupuncture is an ancient technique validated by the WHO and modern science for the treatment of various health conditions. In our practice, we integrate this ancestral wisdom with Western clinical knowledge to offer safe and effective treatment.

It is ideal for those seeking pain management without drugs or as a complement to their medical treatment. In addition to treating physical pain, it is highly effective for regulating stress, anxiety, and sleep disorders, promoting a state of general equilibrium (Homeostasis).
benefits: Effective chronic and acute pain management

1.title: TCM Diagnosis
1.desc: Complete evaluation according to Traditional Chinese Medicine principles (pulse, tongue, inquiry).

2.title: Systemic Acupuncture
2.desc: Painless insertion of sterile needles at specific points to restore energy flow (Qi).

3.title: Pain Management
3.desc: Specialized protocols for painful conditions such as lumbago, osteoarthritis, and tendonitis.

4.title: Holistic Approach
4.desc: Treatment that considers not only physical symptoms but also emotional well-being.

kine_musculo.title: Musculoskeletal Kin.
kine_musculo.desc: Advanced rehabilitation for sports injuries, trauma, post-surgery, and back pain.
kine_musculo.longDesc: Musculoskeletal Kinesiology focuses on the assessment and treatment of locomotor system dysfunctions. We use manual techniques, therapeutic exercise, and physical agents to relieve pain, restore range of motion, and strengthen affected muscles. Ideal for sprains, tears, tendonitis, back pain, and post-surgical recovery.

acupuntura_dolor.title: Pain Acupuncture
acupuntura_dolor.desc: Effective treatment for lumbago, sciatica, tendonitis, and chronic joint pain.
acupuntura_dolor.longDesc: Acupuncture is an ancient Traditional Chinese Medicine technique that involves inserting fine needles into specific points of the body. For pain management, acupuncture stimulates endorphin release and modulates pain signals, offering potent and natural relief without pharmacological side effects.

acupuntura_sm.title: Mental Health Acupuncture
acupuntura_sm.desc: Therapeutic approach for managing stress, anxiety, insomnia, and recurrent migraines.
acupuntura_sm.longDesc: Beyond physical pain, acupuncture is extremely effective for regulating the nervous system. This treatment seeks to balance energy flow (Qi) to calm the mind, improve sleep quality, and reduce stress and anxiety levels, promoting a state of comprehensive well-being.

kine_respiratoria.title: Respiratory Kin.
kine_respiratoria.desc: Management of respiratory pathologies (Asthma, COPD, Bronchitis) for adults and children. Bronchial clearing.
kine_respiratoria.longDesc: Specialty dedicated to the prevention, assessment, and treatment of respiratory system alterations. Through manual techniques and breathing exercises, we help eliminate secretions, improve pulmonary ventilation, and optimize respiratory function in patients with acute (bronchitis, pneumonia) or chronic (Asthma, COPD) conditions.

masaje.title: Therapeutic Massage
masaje.desc: Deep manual techniques for relief of contractures, muscle release, and relaxation.
masaje.longDesc: Therapeutic massage is not just relaxation; it's a clinical tool to treat shortened or tense soft tissues. We use deep massage techniques, myofascial release, and trigger points to 'release' muscles, improve blood irrigation, and provide immediate relief from accumulated tension.

domicilio.title: Home Kinesiology
domicilio.desc: Rehabilitation in your home with full equipment. Valdivia, Concepción, and Curanilahue.
domicilio.longDesc: We bring the clinic to your home. Ideal service for postoperative hip/knee patients, seniors with mobility difficulties, or simply those who prefer the comfort and safety of their home. We bring a table, supplies, and necessary physiotherapy equipment for quality care.

video_asesoria.title: Sports Video Consultation
video_asesoria.desc: Specialized remote care for athletes. Technical correction and injury prevention from your home.
video_asesoria.longDesc: Telehealth service optimized for high-performance athletes. We perform sports gesture analysis, live technique correction, and training load adjustments to prevent injuries. Ideal for athletes looking to optimize performance or seeking an expert second opinion on musculoskeletal pain without interrupting their training.
